title: Amazing site!
text: This site is such a life saver. I mean, you can even get clothes to skincare and it‚Äôs just great. I have been shopping from SHEIN for awhile now and it‚Äôs AMAZING. It‚Äôs addicting too, but you don‚Äôt have to worry about your bank account while shopping on SHEIN. Something I really love is they have reviews right under the product, you are allowed to take pictures of the product so you can get a feel for what it might look like. SHEIN does tend to run small on clothes and shoes, so, I recommend going a size up or too on your normal size. (Unless you‚Äôre petite.) I bought my Halloween costume from SHEIN, and I was surprised but they had EVERYTHING I needed for my costume! If you haven‚Äôt already give SHEIN a chance, you will be surprised!
